mapper.sql: t.user_id, t.user_name, t.pwd, t.pay_pwd, t.real_name, t.email, t.mobile_phone, t.id_no, t.sent_address, t.add_time
mapper.delete: delete from user where 1=1 and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( user_name, pwd, pay_pwd, real_name, email, mobile_phone, id_no, sent_address, add_time ) values( #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_pwd = #{payPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_no = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sent_address = #{sentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into user
user_name,
pwd,
pay_pwd,
real_name,
email,
mobile_phone,
id_no,
sent_address,
add_time,
